page.title: 15Chatteris - A Day's Work
page.content:
My Dad is a mechanic. He doesn't work for anyone because he's got his own workshop and tools. When he gets up he dresses, makes tea and has breakfast. Then he puts on his overalls and goes to his workshop. He does re-spraying, welding, bodywork, servicing and restoration work. Restoration is when an old car has been left and not used for years so that it's rusty and the engine has seized up. My Dad has to restore it and make it work so that it can be licenced again.
He doesn't work the same number of hours every day because he goes bowling quite a lot. He comes in from work about 8.30 to 9.00 unless he's been bowling or he's behind in his work.
